Articles.Content:
I've been trying to get SCANsat to make resource maps but it doesn't seem to be working. It is quite possible that I either installed the mods wrong or am using the wrong parts.

here's a shot of the satellite:

![sat_zpsssti7zo4.png](http://i1382.photobucket.com/albums/ah243/rockdoctor42/sat_zpsssti7zo4.png)

The equipment on board is as follows:

Radar Altimetry Sensor

Multispectral Scanner

KA-100 Detection Array (from Karbonite)

Planetary Survey Camera (From MKS)

Here's the big map. As you can see, there is no resource map available:

![map_zpsvnyx8avg.png](http://i1382.photobucket.com/albums/ah243/rockdoctor42/map_zpsvnyx8avg.png)

And here is the settings menu. Also nothing about resources:

![settings_zpsangaqgvd.png](http://i1382.photobucket.com/albums/ah243/rockdoctor42/settings_zpsangaqgvd.png)

What's wrong here?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-03T21:41:51Z" title="04/03/2015 09:41  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 3, 2015</time> by spacedoctor42**

Ok, I feel sort of stupid but not really, the manual for SCANsat is kind of confusing.

Turns out you need [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92393-0-24-2-MapResourceOverlay-for-Science-Karbonite-MKS-and-biomes-VERSION-0-2-7?p=1705789&viewfull=1#post1705789)to make the resource overlay work.
No you really don't. Your problem is something is not updated, either SCANSat or Regolith.
